item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, March 18, 2025 at 6:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Apple restricts Pebble from being awesome with iPhones (471 points | 206 comments)
2. Two new PebbleOS watches (437 points | 170 comments)
3. Show HN: I made a tool to port tweets to Bluesky mantaining their original date (67 points | 18 comments)
4. HTTrack Website Copier (18 points | 3 comments)
5. Google to buy Wiz for $32B (223 points | 420 comments)
6. Preview: Amazon S3 Tables and Lakehouse in DuckDB (38 points | 8 comments)
7. Amazon to kill off local Alexa processing, all voice requests shipped to cloud (74 points | 18 comments)
8. Fedora 42 Beta now available (54 points | 9 comments)
9. Spaceium Inc (YC S24) Is Hiring a Software Engineer ( | hide)
10. Rust on the RP2350 (2024) (98 points | 23 comments)
11. Show HN: I made a live multiplayer Minesweeper game (122 points | 48 comments)
12. SheepIt Render Farm server code goes open source (111 points | 10 comments)
13. Extracting DNA from the air – DNA evidence of human occupancy in indoor premises (215 points | 64 comments)
14. Block YouTube ads on AppleTV by decrypting and stripping ads from Profobuf (2022) (568 points | 351 comments)
15. Tesla Hate Is Making Insurance More Expensive for Owners (18 points | 2 comments)
16. Show HN: I converted my notebook into a searchable database of IT keywords (35 points | 13 comments)
17. Stamina Is a Quiet Advantage (77 points | 29 comments)
18. The Dark Crystal: Age of Resistance Is a Stone-Cold Masterpiece (160 points | 77 comments)
19. Underrated Soft Skill for Developers: Charisma (43 points | 39 comments)
20. 20 Years of YC / HN (26 points | 7 comments)
21. Sesame CSM: A Conversational Speech Generation Model (85 points | 10 comments)
22. The race is on to build the most complex machine (5 points | 1 comment)
23. Building AI agents to query your databases (128 points | 46 comments)
24. Jensen Huang – Nvidia GTC 2025 Keynote (26 points | 9 comments)
25. North Korea Launders Billions in Stolen Crypto (82 points | 24 comments)
26. The model is the product (194 points | 78 comments)
27. Rippling sues Deel over spying (435 points | 97 comments)
28. Rhombus Language (209 points | 114 comments)
29. How I Stay Motivated Working on My Solo SaaS (When It Feels Like Nobody Cares) (53 points | 15 comments)
30. The Unofficial Guide to OpenAI Realtime WebRTC API (35 points | 3 comments)
